topic.title: Licensing of the IHTSDO Workbench
topic.shortdesc: The IHTSDO Workbench comprises a number of components and frameworks. A specific release of the workbench IDE or viewer is usually made available in the form of an application "bundle" that includes one or more terminologies, an integrated database, and the application code. Each bundle is tailored for a particular use, and may be released for a particular target operating environment, replete with an appropriate "installer". Different licences may apply to the the various components of the bundle.

body.section: Any terminologies supplied with a workbench IDE or viewer will be subject to the licences specific to each terminology.
